name: Jessica Jules
bio: Im a college student and I dont know what Im doing with my life, Im doomed.

messages.message: My fish died and Im very sad. Should I bury it or flush it down the toilet?

ai_replies.full: You should bury it, sorry for your loss.

goto.message: Okay, Ill always remember fish sticks, thanks Rex.
Oh okay, I guess its time to flush.
